sub_topic: Identification of the presence of specific functional groups in a compound using UV-Vis spectroscopy
message_1: What functional group(s) are present in the given compound and at what wavelength do they absorb maximum in UV-Vis spectroscopy?
message_2: Unfortunately, you have not provided the structure or name of the compound in question. Please provide the structure or name of the compound so that I can identify the functional groups present and their corresponding maximum absorption wavelengths in UV-Vis spectroscopy.
